step.info: The <ul> element is used for unordered or bulleted lists.

The <ul> element contains the <li> or list item element. Each <li> element contains the text for a bulleted entry in the list. I would be more specific here: <ul> must contain at least one <li> element (and it can only contain <li> elements).

North American wild ducks belong to one of the following categories:

  • Dabbling ducks

  • Diving ducks

The longest species of dabbling ducks in North America are:

  2. Mallard

  3. American black duck

Although the northern pintail is the longest dabbling duck, the mallard is generally considered the largest because of its heavier body weight.
